name: 蒼葉
message: "Phew... I'm home!"
When I get home from work and open the front door, I find the house still and silent.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny?"
No answer. Maybe she went out.
I take off my shoes and head up to my room.
The first thing I do after I get to my room is close the curtains that I left open this morning.
What's that sound?
I open the sliding glass door to the balcony.
A gentle breeze caresses my cheek. Dusk has come to the town.
I squint as I approach the handrail.
I hear something... A song?
Is someone singing?
I can barely make it out... but there's something about it...
This melody...
I lean over the handrail, scanning the area.
I check between the houses. I check the shadows of telephone poles.
I check street corners and signs...
And then, finally...<k><?>
I see something on the roof of a house not too far away.
A solitary figure sitting on the roof, silhouetted by the setting sun.
The silhouette looks a bit strange... but it's probably the umbrella.
The song keeps going. If I listen closely, I can hear each note.
Kind and gentle, soft and clear. I lose myself in the melody.
He called it... the Jellyfish Song.
And now... <k>it's a song of reunion.
As the song slowly comes to an end, the figure holding the umbrella turns toward me.
My vision blurs. He's smiling at me.

name: クリア
message: "I followed the sound of your voice."

name: クリア
message: "...Aoba."
